title: english improve
original_prompt: you have two missio: 1. revise the issue in my question in order to make  it sound more native  2. answer my question
input1: Could you help me rephrase my question to make it sound more natural, and also provide an answer to it?
input2: I need assistance in refining my question for better clarity and fluency, as well as a response to the inquiry itself.
input1_ans:
